Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 runs off 40 balls
Lungi Ngidi took 4 wickets for 29 runs
David Miller and Aiden Markram led South Africa to a 5-wicket victory
Pre-Game Insights: India opted to bat against South Africa in the T20 World Cup 2022
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma said 'We have played in such conditions so conditions are not an excuse.'
Lungi Ngidi said 'This is one of my biggest dreams, to get something like this (award) at the World Cup and help the country win a game.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Perth, Australia
South Africa defeated India by 5 wickets
Others: India scored 133 runs after losing 9 wickets
South Africa needed 134 runs in 20 overs to win
